title: Community Quest: ZERO
message:
We have launched **Math Sprint: Zero** on PageDrop!

It is a sudden-death prototype. One life. No mercy.

**THE QUEST:**
If this experiment hits **25 LIKES**, we will add it to the game permanently.

Play it, break it, and click the Like button if you want it to stay.

[Play Zero Mode](https://mathsprint-zero.pagedrop.io)
